    • Constructor Detail

      • JSONConf

        public JSONConf(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonCfg)
        JSONConf main class. It "wraps" a JSON Object extra function focused on Configuration aspects. Instance of this represent a configuration, built using JSONConfBuilder.
        Parameters:
        jsonCfg - JSON Object to read configuration from.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public <T> T getValue(java.lang.String jsonPath)
        Recovers a configuration value. In the vast majority of time, this is just a configuration parameter. But in facts this can be a JSON Path, in case the parameter the client code is after is deep within the JSON structure.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Expected return type (JSON native types)
        Parameters:
        jsonPath - JSON Path to a parameter
        Returns:
        Parameter value, if found; "null" otherwise.

      • getChild

        public JSONConf getChild(java.lang.String childObjectKey)
        Generates a child JSONConf object from child key, if found. For example, if the original JSON for this Object is: 
             {
         "key" : "value",
         "childObject" : {
             "another_key" : "another_value",
             "chiave" : "valore"
         }
     }
        A call to this method with "childObject" would generate a new JSONConf based on the JSON: 
             {
          "another_key" : "another_value",
          "chiave" : "valore"
     }
        Parameters:
        childObjectKey - Key of a child Object of the wrapped JSON Object
        Returns:
        A new child JSONConf if the key exists; "null" otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
